G Seikret Coil.description: Guardian Seikret waistgear. The long, white feathers produce a faint, exquisite glow.

Rey Sandcoil Gamma.description: Waist armor made from special Rey Dau materials. The azure design evokes the fortitude of the Arch-tempered.

Blossom Coat Alpha.description: Blossom Ticket waistgear. Sure to make you as graceful as a spring butterfly floating among the flowers.
